SENT.plain: Behçet's disease is a systemic disease characterized by oral aphthosis, genital ulcers, ocular lesions, gastrointestinal, musculoskeletal, neurological and major vessel involvement
Arterial involvement, aneurysms and arterial thrombosis have been reported in 1.5-3% of patients
In this case report, we present a patient with ulnar arterial aneurysm associated with Behçet's disease
